Class AvlConfig

    Handles the AVL configuration data.

    SkiBu Smith

        max speed in m/s

      • minSpeedForValidHeading

        public static double minSpeedForValidHeading()
        If AVL report speed is below this threshold then the heading is not considered valid.
        Returns:

      • getMinAvlLatitude

        public static float getMinAvlLatitude()
        For filtering out bad AVL reports. The default values of latitude 15.0 to 55.0 and longitude of -135.0 to -60.0 are for North America, including Mexico and Canada. Can see maps of lat/lon at http://www.mapsofworld.com/lat_long/north-america.html
        Returns:

      • getMinAvlLatitudeParamName

        public static java.lang.String getMinAvlLatitudeParamName()

      • getMinAvlLongitude

        public static float getMinAvlLongitude()

      • getMinAvlLongitudeParamName

        public static java.lang.String getMinAvlLongitudeParamName()

      • getMaxAvlLongitude

        public static float getMaxAvlLongitude()

      • getMaxAvlLongitudeParamName

        public static java.lang.String getMaxAvlLongitudeParamName()

      • getUnpredictableAssignmentsRegEx

        public static java.lang.String getUnpredictableAssignmentsRegEx()
        So can filter out unpredictable assignments such as for training coaches, service vehicles, or simply vehicles that are not in service and should not be attempted to be made predictable. Returns empty string, the default value if transitime.avl.unpredictableAssignmentsRegEx is not set.

      • getMinTimeBetweenAvlReportsSecs

        public static int getMinTimeBetweenAvlReportsSecs()
        Minimum allowable time in seconds between AVL reports for a vehicle. If get a report closer than this number of seconds to the previous one then the new report is filtered out and not processed. Important for when reporting rate is really high, such as every few seconds.

      • shouldLogToStdOut

        public static boolean shouldLogToStdOut()
        For debugging. Logs each AVL report to stdout if set to true. Default is false.
        Returns:
